title: How to Create a Mii on the Nintendo 3DS

steps.headline: Access Mii Maker by tapping the Mii Maker button on the home screen.
Select Create New Mii from the button on the touchscreen.
Decide how you want to create the Mii.
steps.description: You can build your Mii from scratch using the Mii Maker, or you can take a photo of the person that you want to make a Mii of and let the 3DS software turn it into an actual Mii.

steps.headline: Choose the gender of the Mii that you are making.
steps.description: From there, you will be asked about the Mii's skin tone, eye color, hair color, and hairstyle.

steps.headline: Hold the 3DS at eye level and look straight into the camera.
steps.description: Make sure to line up the top of the head with the top of the frame and the bottom of the chin at the bottom of the frame. If the Mii that you are making isn't your own, tap the Switch button to switch to the outer cameras to take the picture.

steps.headline: Tap the Take button at bottom of the touchscreen or press the A button to take a picture.
After the 3DS generates a face, you can decide if you are happy with it or not.
steps.description: If you want to edit it further, tap 'Next' to begin perfecting it!

steps.headline: Select the Mii's gender.
steps.description: From there, use the side panel buttons to navigate the Mii Maker. When you are done creating the Mii, tap Next.

steps.headline: Fill in the Mii's information.
steps.description: When you are complete, click on Save and then Yes.

text: Steps Access Mii Maker by tapping the Mii Maker button on the home screen.  Select Create New Mii from the button on the touchscreen.  Decide how you want to create the Mii. You can build your Mii from scratch using the Mii Maker, or you can take a photo of the person that you want to make a Mii of and let the 3DS software turn it into an actual Mii. Taking a Photograph Select Create from photo. Then tap OK. Choose the gender of the Mii that you are making. From there, you will be asked about the Mii's skin tone, eye color, hair color, and hairstyle. Hold the 3DS at eye level and look straight into the camera. Make sure to line up the top of the head with the top of the frame and the bottom of the chin at the bottom of the frame. If the Mii that you are making isn't your own, tap the Switch button to switch to the outer cameras to take the picture. Tap the Take button at bottom of the touchscreen or press the A button to take a picture.  After the 3DS generates a face, you can decide if you are happy with it or not. If you want to edit it further, tap 'Next' to begin perfecting it! Building a Mii from Scratch Choose Start from Scratch.  Select the Mii's gender. From there, use the side panel buttons to navigate the Mii Maker. When you are done creating the Mii, tap Next. Fill in the Mii's information. When you are complete, click on Save and then Yes.
